attributes.action: IMMEDIATELY LINK THE THE STATE PENSION TO EARNINGS SO THAT ALL PENSIONERS WILL BE ENTITLED TO RECEIVE AN ADEQUATE INCOME, THUS ENABLING THE CURRENT MEANS-TESTED BENEFIT SYSTEM TO BE ABOLISHED.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition calls upon the Government to immediately, without further delay, link the State Pension to average earnings so that all pensioners will be entitled to receive an adequate income, thus enabling the current means-tested benefit system for the elderly to become obsolete and therefore easily abolished.

rejection.details: Please resubmit without BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
